sections.heading: 01|Purchase of machinery, equipment, or wearing apparel - care and custody - inventory - storage - agreement for construction of switch
sections.text: Effective:September 29, 2005Latest Legislation:House Bill 66 - 126th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFThe board of county commissioners may purchase su

sections.heading: the Revised Code apply only to such portion of the purchase price of such machinery, tools, trucks, or equipment as is to be paid in cash, exclusive of any credit from the sale of used vehicles, machinery, tools, or equipment to the vendor
sections.text: the Revised Code apply only to such portion of the purchase price of such machinery, tools, trucks, or equipment as is to be paid in cash, exclusive of any credit from the sale of used vehicles, machinery, tools, or equipment to the vendor.
